message: Right on. New night, new topic?
I'm guessing you'd have more luck resurrecting the old topic, but I don't know.
Also, there's already a convore topic on htis
@shakefu I'm not from ATL, but I'm down.
Ha, I'm thinking of starting post-dinner (8ish?).
Here's the plan: Tentatively meet up at Porter Beer Bar between 8-9. Keep an eye on #pyconbarcrawl for updates/moving bars. Huzzah smartphones.
Try Virginia Highlands, Little Five Points, or Decatur.
Those neighborhoods fit the bill.
Look at the bars page on the pycon site.
I'm in for a crawl.
lol
Twains is near a train station, if people prefer that form of transit
Oh, also Leons
Any ATL Pyconners know what's up?
Meh, I'm a shitty organizer. I was secretly wishing for an enthusiastic, "Oh hell yeah," from someone and shifting responsibility onto then. ;)
It's for good beer, so you want to hit it early enough you can still tell the difference
Would love to get a big ass bar crawl going tonight.
https://convore.com/pycon-2011/pub-crawl-for-first-timers-and-non/
(Preferably someone from ATL who knows what area has a bunch of bars in walking distance of one another - or better yet, on the same block - every City has that area, I just don't know where it is.)
Just interested in meeting new people, and getting drunk with them.
Twain's in Decatur is good but it's a bit far.  I'd recommend somewhere in midtown
@gthank [CM Burns:] Excellent...
Decatur also sounds possible.
We did dinner at The Porter Beer Bar last night. It's in Little Five Points and might make a good starting point.
Decatur can be a pub crawl all by itself.  Twains, Brick store, Raging Burrito, Marlay house, Cakes and Ale, The Angel and a little farther away Thinking Man Tavern and Corner Pub
Leon's is my dog's favorite pub.
I'm totally down with following whoever seems like they drink the most.
Well, for those who are interested, spread the word: Check in here on #pyconbarcrawl sometime between 7-8 and let's do this.
@masterbunnyfu I'm assuming they serve some bar food there?  I could use a bite, but don't want to miss the trip.
@gthank gonna try to.  Haven't been out of the hotel yet, really would like to do something tonight.
Is the plan still Porter Beer Bar?  The Convore app isn't working on my phone.
@gthank thanks for the info, but it will have to wait for another time.  Hunger got the better of me already...
checking in....ready in the lobby.  Anyone else?
@husker_geek The food at porter is some strange mix of bar food and southern food, but it's good and I'm pretty sure it's all organic.
hehe. Have fun tonight.
Anybody still waiting to go?
I'd prefer to go somewhere in walking distance, but it sounds like the last thing was PBB
you down in the lobby?  i've got a red shirt and black hoodie
Ok, heading up.  Be there in a sec.  Gray sport coat and purple dress shirt.
I'm in the TiP.  Gonna head up, but I can't convore on my phone.
Yeah,  me
Porter Beer Bar doesn't seem like it's in walking distance
ok, we're here.  anyone else interested?
Getting food, but I'm down for bar hopping by the hotel.
@shakefu we're interested...what bars do you have in mind?  we're out looking around right now
we're (Cory and I) getting a table at Meehan's...wait is about 20 minutes, hoping to see some of you!
Whoops, bar crawl happened, but I got distracted and didn't update anything. Mah bad. Hopes you found good times anyway.
